text: hollywood Presenter Stephen Colbert, who is just some hours away from hosting this year's Primetime Emmy Awards, has shared an amusing video a before taking the stage at the star studded ceremony Host Stephen Colbert dances onstage during the 69th Emmy Awards at the Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles. Pic / AFP Presenter Stephen Colbert, who is just some hours away from hosting this year's Primetime Emmy Awards, has shared an amusing video a before taking the stage at the star studded ceremony. The'Late Show'host tried to keep things controversial by captioning the video,'hot leak from Russia! Sorry, not the one you've been waiting for.'The video shows clips from his recent trip to Russia.
